title: A Family
short_cast: Go Ayano, Hiroshi Tachi, Machiko Ono, Yukiya Kitamura, Hayato Ichihara, Hayato Isomura, Shun Sugata, Suon Kan, Ryutaro Ninomiya, Taro Suruga, Ryo Iwamatsu, Kosuke Toyohara, Shinobu Terajima
cast: Go Ayano, Hiroshi Tachi, Machiko Ono, Yukiya Kitamura, Hayato Ichihara, Hayato Isomura, Shun Sugata, Suon Kan, Ryutaro Ninomiya, Taro Suruga, Ryo Iwamatsu, Kosuke Toyohara, Shinobu Terajima
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Taken in by the yakuza at a young age, Kenji swears allegiance to his old-school boss, pledging to adhere to the family code amid ever-changing times.
